item.title: Adding emotes and tele coords for them
item.dc:creator: @zach14411 zach1441!
item.description:
@zach14411 wrote:

oh that part forgot bout that
open up texthandler
search for the case number of the tab
and add the name there
for example

p.sendFrame126("", 180);
p.sendFrame126("@red@Tzaar",181);
p.sendFrame126("@red@ModIsland", 178);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@godwars",175);
p.sendFrame126("@red@1v1",177);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@Fish",185);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@Train",186);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@Barrow",173);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@Shops",179);
p.sendFrame126("@red@Multi",187);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@Cape",176);
p.sendFrame126("@blu@train",13371);
p.sendFrame126("@whi@MINI",13363);

is what i have for my server

Read full topic

item.source: Adding emotes and tele coords for them

item.title: Adding emotes and tele coords for them
item.dc:creator: @zach14411 zach1441!
item.description:
@zach14411 wrote:

well first off you need to find these cases or create them if you havnt
case 169;
case 168;
case 162;
case 165;
case 164;
case 161;
case 170;
case 166:
case 171;
case 172;
case 167;
case 163;
are the tab cases
this is how you create the tele command

case 162;
if(teleblock == true){ //makes sure they cant teleport if they are teleblocked
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
}
else
{
customCommand("TELEPORTNAME"); //made by Musicmad441
}
break;
case 169;

and so on tell you used all the tabs for the stuff you want
now we need to find or make the custom commands were you place this is under all the commands
this is how you write the custom command

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("TELEPORTNAME"))
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //Makes sure teleblock works
}
else
{
	sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE");
	teleportToX = XCORDS;
	teleportToY = YCORDS;
}

and thats it

Read full topic
